main event: An unidentified flying object was reported near Texarkana, Texas, on July 25, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as a round, bright, white object silently hovering,The sighting lasted for about 4 minutes,The radar detected the object, which remained stationary before disappearing,The report concluded that the sighting could be a satellite, balloon, or aircraft,The reliability of the witness was noted by a captain in the USAF.
witness description: Thomas J. Williams, a reliable citizen associated with the USAF
